comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: pennyrichardsca: Thanks for connecting her up with her profession and her partner.  While hunting for a confirming image, I found through one of our subscription databases an article in The Christian Science Monitor for April 16, 1929, where she is pictured and quoted discussing architecture as a career for women.
